MonsterTrait.Name: Tail Spike Regrowth
MonsterTrait.Text: The manticore has twenty-four tail spikes. Used spikes regrow when the manticore finishes a long rest.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The manticore makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws or three with its tail spikes.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Tail Spike
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 100/200 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.
